original_text: We want to be very careful about this large gift of money. That is why the other believer will come with us. We do not want anyone to say that we have done something wrong.
korean_text: 이것을 조심함은 우리가 맡은 이 거액의 연보에 대하여 아무도 우리를 비방하지 못하게 하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: We want to be very careful
about this large gift of money
the other believer will come with us
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 믿는 사람이 우리와 함께 올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: We do not want anyone to say
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 아무도 말하게 하고 싶지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: that we have done something wrong
